title: How to Get the Terra Blade in Terraria

steps.headline: Before you can even think about the Terra Blade, you need to get Night's Edge.
steps.description: It is the strongest Pre-Hardmode sword.

steps.headline: Visit the Crimson Biome.
steps.description: Mine as much Crimtane ore as you can. An alternative to this is to Beat the Eye of Cthulhu in a Crimson biome. You need 15 Crimtane Bars, which means you need 45 Crimtane ore to make the Blood Butcher, the first ingredient of Night's Edge. If you have a corrupt biome, you can substitute with a Light's Bane.

steps.headline: Visit the Dungeon.
steps.description: First, you will need to Beat Skeletron. Then, open Golden Chests until you find the Muramasa.

steps.headline: Visit the Underworld.
steps.description: Mine Hellstone ore (you need 60, plus 20 Obsidian.) To make Hellstone Bars, you need a Hellforge, which you can(visit this link if you have trouble: Find a Ruined House in Terraria ) find in a Ruined House. Craft 20 Hellstone Bars and make a Fiery Greatsword.

steps.headline: Visit the Corruption.
steps.description: You need to mine 45 Demonite ore to make your 15 Demonite Bars. Once you get 15 Bars, craft Light's Bane.

steps.headline: Find the Underground Jungle.
steps.description: Once you do, kill Hornets until you have 15 Stingers, and find 12 Jungle Spores. Combine these to make the Blade of Grass.

steps.headline: Combine all the swords mentioned above at a Crimson/Corrupt Altar.
steps.description: You will get Night's Edge, the first ingredient of the Terra Blade.

steps.headline: Beat the Wall of Flesh and enter Hardmode.
steps.description: A few guides on how to beat the Wall of Flesh are found here and here.

steps.headline: Mine Orithcalum/Mythril and craft a Orithcalum/Mythril Anvil.
Beat one of the Mechanical bosses to get Hallowed Bars.
steps.description: There are three Mechanical Bosses: Destroyer, The Twins, and Skeleton Prime. A guide to beating Skeletron Prime is described here.

steps.headline: Beat the Twins, and wait for a Solar Eclipse.
steps.description: They have a 1/20 chance of occuring every day.

steps.headline: On the day of the Solar Eclipse, either wear Turtle Armor, drink a Battle Potion, stand near a Water Candle, or all of those at the same time.
Kill Mothron.
steps.description: They have a chance to drop Broken Hero Swords. You need three Broken Hero Swords to craft the Terra Blade.

steps.headline: Combine (at a Mythril/Orithcalum Anvil) a Broken Hero Sword and Night's Edge to get True Night's Edge.
steps.description: Then combine Excalibur and a Broken Hero Sword to make True Excalibur.

steps.headline: If need be, wait for more Solar Eclipses.
steps.description: Continue to slaughter Swamp Things and Frankensteins.

steps.headline: Combine True Excalibur, True Night's Edge, and a Broken Hero Sword at a Mythril/Orithcalum Anvil.
steps.description: Congratulations, you now have the one of the strongest swords in the game!

text: Night's Edge Before you can even think about the Terra Blade, you need to get Night's Edge. It is the strongest Pre-Hardmode sword. Visit the Crimson Biome. Mine as much Crimtane ore as you can. An alternative to this is to Beat the Eye of Cthulhu in a Crimson biome. You need 15 Crimtane Bars, which means you need 45 Crimtane ore to make the Blood Butcher, the first ingredient of Night's Edge. If you have a corrupt biome, you can substitute with a Light's Bane. Visit the Dungeon. First, you will need to Beat Skeletron. Then, open Golden Chests until you find the Muramasa. Visit the Underworld. Mine Hellstone ore (you need 60, plus 20 Obsidian.) To make Hellstone Bars, you need a Hellforge, which you can(visit this link if you have trouble: Find a Ruined House in Terraria ) find in a Ruined House. Craft 20 Hellstone Bars and make a Fiery Greatsword. Visit the Corruption. You need to mine 45 Demonite ore to make your 15 Demonite Bars. Once you get 15 Bars, craft Light's Bane. Find the Underground Jungle. Once you do, kill Hornets until you have 15 Stingers, and find 12 Jungle Spores. Combine these to make the Blade of Grass. Combine all the swords mentioned above at a Crimson/Corrupt Altar. You will get Night's Edge, the first ingredient of the Terra Blade. Excalibur Beat the Wall of Flesh and enter Hardmode. A few guides on how to beat the Wall of Flesh are found here and here. Mine Orithcalum/Mythril and craft a Orithcalum/Mythril Anvil. Place it inside your base. Beat one of the Mechanical bosses to get Hallowed Bars. There are three Mechanical Bosses: Destroyer, The Twins, and Skeleton Prime. A guide to beating Skeletron Prime is described here. True Night's Edge and Excalibur Beat the Twins, and wait for a Solar Eclipse. They have a 1/20 chance of occuring every day. On the day of the Solar Eclipse, either wear Turtle Armor, drink a Battle Potion, stand near a Water Candle, or all of those at the same time.  Kill Mothron. They have a chance to drop Broken Hero Swords. You need three Broken Hero Swords to craft the Terra Blade. Combine (at a Mythril/Orithcalum Anvil) a Broken Hero Sword and Night's Edge to get True Night's Edge. Then combine Excalibur and a Broken Hero Sword to make True Excalibur. Terra Blade If need be, wait for more Solar Eclipses. Continue to slaughter Swamp Things and Frankensteins. Combine True Excalibur, True Night's Edge, and a Broken Hero Sword at a Mythril/Orithcalum Anvil. Congratulations, you now have the one of the strongest swords in the game!
